summary: Consume the Grafana API to perform operations like creating, deleting, updating, and retrieving dashboards.

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (Dashboard, Team, Team Member, User, Custom API Call).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource (Create, Delete, Get, Get Many, Update, Custom API Call).

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Title of the dashboard to create.

parameters.name: additionalFields
parameters.description: Additional fields for creating a dashboard like Folder Name or ID.

parameters.name: dashboardUidOrUrl
parameters.description: Unique alphabetic identifier or URL of the dashboard to delete or retrieve.

parameters.name: returnAll
parameters.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Max number of results to return (1 to 100).
